law.catch_line: Schedules of fees and charges for services rendered in facilities operated by city-county boards of health.
law.text: City-county boards of health established by KRS 212.350 and operating hospitals and clinics may establish schedules of fees and charges for services rendered therein or thereby and may recover such fees and charges from any person who receives such services.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 65, sec. 1, effective March 24, 1952.
